scripts.preinstall: git -C ./lib/wildtype fetch --all --tags --prune || git clone https://github.com/sourdough/wildtype.git -b main ./lib/wildtype
scripts.install: git -C ./lib/wildtype stash && git -C ./lib/wildtype checkout tags/v$npm_package_version -b main
scripts.postinstall: echo "ingredient has external dependencies at $npm_package_version" && git -C ./lib/wildtype status
scripts.test: echo 'npm dependency that manages its own with git'
